alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:37PM MST until January 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Locally higher gusts of 60 to 70 mph expected near Clark. * WHERE...Cody Foothills, including WY Highway 120. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be prepared for sudden crosswinds if you must drive. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
